shortDescription: "A variable contains a whole object"
shortCorrection: "A variable contains a reference to an object"
concepts:
  - Variable
  - Object

  - Value
related:
  - id: AssignmentCopiesObject
    relation: Operational consequence
inOtherPl:
  - pl: Java
    id: VariablesHoldObjects
#- pl: JavaScript
#  id: VariablesHoldObjects

  - id: plr3.13
    sections: ["3.1"]

  # from: 3.9.6

  - citationKey: kaczmarczykIdentifyingStudentMisconceptions2010

    relationship: "Students see variable declaration as object allocation"

Any variable, such as `a` in `a = 1`, directly holds the value of the object.

frontmatter.shortDescription: A variable contains a whole object
frontmatter.shortCorrection: A variable contains a reference to an object
